crossover_price_indicator.label: Price-Indicator Crossover
crossover_price_indicator.description: Compares price (such as closing price) with a single indicator line. Commonly used to determine support and resistance in trends.

default_rule.description: Signal is generated when price crosses above the indicator line.

crossover_fast_slow_ma.label: Fast-Slow Indicator Crossover
crossover_fast_slow_ma.description: Compares two indicator lines with different speeds. Core of trend-following strategies. For example, golden cross and death cross of moving averages.

default_rule.description: Signal is generated when fast line crosses above slow line (e.g., golden cross).

boundary_comparison_oscillator.label: Oscillator Overbought/Oversold
boundary_comparison_oscillator.description: Determines whether an oscillator indicator (such as RSI, Stochastics) has entered preset overbought or oversold zones.

default_rule.description: Signal is generated when indicator enters overbought zone.

threshold_simple.label: Fixed Threshold Comparison
threshold_simple.description: Determines whether indicator value is above or below a fixed value. Commonly used for oscillators centered around zero (such as MACD, CCI). This usage can be applied to both trend determination (e.g., MACD>0) and range determination.

default_rule.description: Indicator value crosses above zero line.

band_break_bollinger.label: Band Breakout
band_break_bollinger.description: Determines whether price breaks through the upper or lower limit of a dynamic channel generated by the indicator. Commonly used for Bollinger Bands and other channel breakout strategies.

volatility_threshold.label: Volatility Level
volatility_threshold.description: Determines whether market volatility is above or below a certain threshold. Can be used as a filter for trend or range strategies. Applicable to volatility indicators such as ATR.

volume_spike.label: Volume Anomaly
volume_spike.description: Determines whether volume is significantly higher or lower than its moving average. Can serve as confirmation of trend breakout or warning of overheated market sentiment.

pattern_recognition.label: Pattern Recognition Signal
pattern_recognition.description: Captures specific pattern signals directly given by indicators, which may be trend continuation or reversal patterns.
